spec_data.Name: esptool
spec_data.Description:
esptool.py A command line utility to communicate with the ROM bootloader in
Espressif ESP8266 WiFi microcontroller. Allows flashing firmware, reading back
firmware, querying chip parameters, etc. Developed by the community, not by
Espressif Systems.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 23 Aug 2017 12:03:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A utility to communicate with the ROM bootloader in Espressif ESP8266
